content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: white_bed
inventory=[{"type": "carrot", "quantity": 39, "index": 13}, {"type": "zoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 57, "index": 14}, {"type": "llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 13, "index": 15}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 28, "index": 16}, {"type": "grass_block", "quantity": 35, "index": 18}, {"type": "red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 15, "index": 19}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 30, "index": 24}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 13, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a white_bed, I need to craft acacia_planks first. To craft acacia_planks, I need to place acacia_wood in the crafting table. I will move the acacia_wood from slot 39 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: I can now craft the acacia_planks by moving the item from the craft slot (0) to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
